info.title: Power BI Embedded Management Client
info.description: Client to manage your Power BI Embedded workspace collections and retrieve workspaces.

get.description: Indicates which operations can be performed by the Power BI Resource Provider.

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

post.description: Verify the specified Power BI Workspace Collection name is valid and not already in use.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

get.description: Retrieves all existing Power BI workspace collections in the specified subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

post.description: Migrates an existing Power BI Workspace Collection to a different resource group and/or subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

get.description: Retrieves all existing Power BI workspace collections in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

get.description: Retrieves an existing Power BI Workspace Collection.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: workspaceCollectionName
parameters.description: Power BI Embedded Workspace Collection name

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

put.description: Creates a new Power BI Workspace Collection with the specified properties. A Power BI Workspace Collection contains one or more workspaces, and can be used to provision keys that provide API access to those workspaces.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: workspaceCollectionName
parameters.description: Power BI Embedded Workspace Collection name

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

delete.description: Delete a Power BI Workspace Collection.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: workspaceCollectionName
parameters.description: Power BI Embedded Workspace Collection name

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

patch.description: Update an existing Power BI Workspace Collection with the specified properties.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: workspaceCollectionName
parameters.description: Power BI Embedded Workspace Collection name

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

post.description: Retrieves the primary and secondary access keys for the specified Power BI Workspace Collection.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: workspaceCollectionName
parameters.description: Power BI Embedded Workspace Collection name

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

post.description: Regenerates the primary or secondary access key for the specified Power BI Workspace Collection.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: workspaceCollectionName
parameters.description: Power BI Embedded Workspace Collection name

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

get.description: Retrieves all existing Power BI workspaces in the specified workspace collection.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: workspaceCollectionName
parameters.description: Power BI Embedded Workspace Collection name

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition specified in the schema. Exception will be thrown.

message.description: Message indicating an unavailable name due to a conflict, or a description of the naming rules that are violated.

nameAvailable.description: Specifies a Boolean value that indicates whether the specified Power BI Workspace Collection name is available to use.

reason.description: Reason why the workspace collection name cannot be used.

description.description: The localized friendly description for the operation as shown to the user. This description should be thorough, yet concise. It will be used in tool-tips and detailed views.

operation.description: The localized friendly name for the operation as shown to the user. This name should be concise (to fit in drop downs), but clear (self-documenting). Use Title Casing and include the entity/resource to which it applies.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; governs the display of the operation in the RBAC UX and the audit logs UX. Default value is 'user,system'

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name. This form is also expected to include the publisher/company responsible. Use Title Casing. Begin with "Microsoft" for 1st party services.

resource.description: The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation. This form should match the public documentation for the resource provider. Use Title Casing. For examples, refer to the "name" section.

targetResourceGroup.description: Name of the resource group the Power BI workspace collections will be migrated to.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object. This name should match the action name that appears in RBAC / the event service.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
